benchmark_details.name: KoDialogBench
benchmark_details.overview: KoDialogBench is a benchmark designed to assess language modelsâ€™ conversational capabilities in Korean, structured into diverse test datasets covering dialogue comprehension and response selection tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the conversational abilities of language models in Korean and facilitate the development of conversational agents.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Our benchmark may suffer from chronic benchmark contamination due to the scarcity of Korean language resources.

data.source: Native Korean dialogues collected from public sources such as AI Hub and translated dialogues from other languages.
data.annotation: Data collected from public sources and translations where necessary.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the performance of various language models across the defined tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better conversational understanding and capability of the language models.
methodology.baseline_results: Human average performance averaged 76.7 across tasks.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Procedures for data handling and translation were followed to mitigate the amplification of harmful content or biases.
